summary: Gives you the choice of armour type and weapon type at the start of the game in helgen keep
descriptionHtml:
[color=Red][size=3]Name          : [/size][/color]Helgen Equipment Variation
[color=Red][size=3]Version       : [/size][/color]1.0
[color=Red][size=3]Date          : [/size][/color]22/08/12
[color=Red][size=3]Category      : [/size][/color]Miscellaneous
[color=Red][size=3]Author(s)     : [/size][/color]SoulLimit
[color=Red]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]

[color=Red][size=4]Description:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-------------------------[/color]
Allows you to choose what kind of weapon and armour you are going to use right at the start of helgen. No more having to use one handed weapons until you find a 2 handed one, or using combat until you can pick up a bow. From the outset use the weapons of your choice.

[color=Red][size=4]Detail:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]--------------------[/color]
Adds in the following equipment to the Equipment Chest in Helgen:

Imperial Heavy Armour & Grieves
Longbow with 20 arrows
Iron Greatsword
Iron Shield
Mage Boots
Enchanted Mage Robes

It also adds the following to the body of the dead stormcloak Gunjar:
Iron Boots
Iron Armour
Iron Shield
Mage Boots
Enchanted Mage Robes
Long Bow with 20 arrows
Iron Battleaxe

[color=Red][size=4]---Installation:---[/size][/color]
[color=Red]--------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red][size=3]Manual Installation:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]---------------------------------[/color]
Download and Extract the esp of the RAR file to your Skyrim/Data Folder.

[color=Red][size=4]---Uninstallation:---[/size][/color]
[color=Red]----------------------------------[/color]
[color=Red][size=3]Manual Uninstallation:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-----------------------------------[/color]
Delete the esp from your Skyrim/Data folder

[color=Red][size=4]Incompatabilities:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]-------------------------------[/color]
It is possible that a conflict could occur when something else changes the contents of the chest of the body. Having this loaded after that mod will give this priority

[color=Red][size=4]Tools Used:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]------------------------[/color]
[url=http://newvegasnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=40278]Pyr√≤s: GuideLines[/url]
[url=http://www.win-rar.com/]WinRar[/url]
Creation Kit, Available on Steam

[color=Red][size=4]Legal and licensing:[/size][/color]
[color=Red]---------------------------------[/color]
First ask for my permission.
